text: We usually never got out of there before four or five o'clock in the morning. Every morning. So it was rough.
author: Cab Calloway

text: My first care the following morning was, to devise some means of discovering the man in the grey cloak.
author: Adelbert von Chamisso

text: I looked at films as a career from necessity but all I have really wanted is my home and children. The two things just do not work out together when one has to leave home at 5.30 am in the morning to go to the studio.
author: Dinah Sheridan

text: We also own a little boat and I'm like a kid with it. I take off early in the morning, fishing rod in tow, and just drift about the ocean all day.
author: Perry Como

text: All we had aboard the ship that morning was one Annapolis graduate and three reserves.
author: Barney Ross
